name: @asu-etx/ring-leader
description: Â©, 2020 Arizona State University ETX. Libraries to support LTI 1.3 enabled tools
author: Melanie.Narish@asu.edu

scripts.build: cd ../rl-tool-example-server && yarn run build && cd ../rl-tool-example-client && yarn run build
scripts.develop: yarn install && yarn run build && concurrently --kill-others "yarn run watch-tool-example-client"
scripts.heroku-create: npx ts-node scripts/heroku-init.ts && yarn run heroku-update-configs && yarn run setup-tool-keys
